title: Polki Kundan Statement Haaram with Gemstone Drops - "Ratna Manjari"
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Setting Style: Closed Setting (Kundan)
features: This 'Ratna Manjari' Haaram showcases intricate Kundan craftsmanship, a hallmark of Hyderabadi jewelry. The necklace features a series of Polki diamond-encrusted motifs in floral and geometric shapes. Delicate clusters of Emerald drops and Freshwater Pearls gracefully dangle from each motif, adding movement and light. The centerpiece is a large, oval-shaped faceted Emerald cabochon, encircled by Polki diamonds, radiating an aura of timeless elegance. Below the emerald is beautiful faceted amethyst drops.
occasions: and grand receptions. It's also a striking piece for festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
or modern formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: A blend of traditional Telugu artistry and modern design sensibilities, the 'Ratna Manjari' Haaram is an heirloom piece. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a distinct vintage charm, while the contrasting colours of Emerald and Amethyst offer a unique and eye-catching aesthetic. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and durability. This piece is more than just jewelry; it's a statement of cultural heritage and refined taste.
